mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_matches FROM product p WHERE p.product_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') -- 상세카테고리 매칭 OR (p.cate_code, p.cd_code) IN ( SELECT cate_code, cd_code FROM category_detail WHERE cd_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ) -- (선택) 카테고리명 매칭 OR p.cate_code IN ( SELECT cate_code FROM category WHERE cate_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )

SELECT p.product_code AS productCode, p.product_name AS productName, p.product_description AS productDescription, p.product_quantity AS productQuantity, img.image_url AS title_image_url, pr.price_original AS priceOriginal, pr.price_selling AS priceSelling, IF(pr.price_original > 0, FLOOR((pr.price_original - pr.price_selling) / pr.price_original * 100), 0 ) AS discount_rate, COALESCE(AVG(rv.rating),0) AS avg_rating, COUNT(rv.review_code) AS review_count, COALESCE(wl.wish_count,0) AS wishlist_count FROM product p LEFT JOIN image img ON p.product_code = img.product_code AND img.image_type='title' LEFT JOIN price pr ON p.product_code = pr.product_code LEFT JOIN order_items oi ON p.product_code = oi.product_code LEFT JOIN review rv ON oi.order_item_code = rv.order_item_code AND rv.is_active=1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT product_code, COUNT(*) AS wish_count FROM wishlist GROUP BY product_code ) wl ON p.product_code = wl.product_code WHERE p.product_active = 1 AND ( p.product_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM category_detail cd WHERE cd.cate_code=p.cate_code AND cd.cd_code=p.cd_code AND cd.cd_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') ) OR p.cate_code IN ( SELECT cate_code FROM category WHERE cate_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') ) ) GROUP BY p.product_code, p.product_name, p.product_description, p.product_quantity, img.image_url, pr.price_original, pr.price_selling ORDER BY p.product_code DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}
